vlive.korean: [곰곰] 아침... [Thinking hard] Morning... 듣기 View video Dispatch : [Dicon] "모모’s Special Day" (디아이콘 : 트와이스)
그때가 아침 한 7시 반? 8시였나? That was 7:30am? 8am? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 소통타임🐻
원래는 휘인이가 아침에 아침이었나? Wheein texted me in the morning. Was it the morning? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : 🌙달이 태양을 가릴 때🌙
vlive.english: Wheein texted me in the morning. Was it the morning?

vlive.korean: 그렇게 또 아침이 돼서 자고 이렇게... Then, I fell asleep in the morning. 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : 🌙달이 태양을 가릴 때🌙
vlive.english: Then, I fell asleep in the morning.

vlive.korean: 날씨가 아침에 제가 봤을 때 영하 11도? When I saw it in the morning, it was minus 11 degrees? 듣기 View video ITZY : 🖤
vlive.english: When I saw it in the morning, it was minus 11 degrees?
